import React from 'react' import './Page02.css' function Page02() { return (

MAKING THE PERFECT BLEND OF DIGITAL AGE

In a time and age where the marketing scenario is volving way beyond what meets the eye, Digitalmedium provides wide scope to build anyconcept, product or service, the task of creatingworld class advertisements involves thecollective ideas and creative expanse of thecreators.As an expert in the Digital media field, we feelthere is dire need for mediation through trainingand interactive learning for exchange of vitalinformation, ideas and best practices.

According to the latest studiesIndian digital market is growingat a rate of 20% in the year of2021 making it reach a marketsize of Rs. 18,398 crore. Thesame industry is expecting aCAGR growth rate of 22.47% toreach Rs. 23,673 crore by 2022.

THIS DIGITAL MARKETING COURSEWILL ENABLE YOUR SUCCESSFULL CAREER AS WELL AS BUSINESS ENHANCEMENT

) } export default Page02
